title: 32oz African Shea Butter

Treats dark spots, stretch mark , burns, lessens the irritation in psoriasis, wrinkles, blemishes, Diaper rash, scars & skin discolorations. 3. Moisturizes and Heals Skin - relieves symptoms of extreme dryness, eczema, dermatitis and skin allergies 4. Anti-inflammatory Properties .Provides Pain relief from swelling and arthritis. 5. This is due to its hydrating properties which help in relaxing the tension in the facial skin, thus easing respiration. 6. Improves muscle relaxation and stiffness in joint aches/arthritis. 7.
